pages.text: These tiered furnaces will smelt anything you can smelt in a regular furnace. Each successive tier applies a multiplier that stacks with the $(l:processenhancement:concepts/overdrive)Overdrive$(/l) effect.$(br)$(li)Basic: 1x multiplier$(li)Intermediate: 2x multiplier$(li)Advanced: 4x multiplier$(li)Industrial: 8x multiplier
